website_summaries.verdict: This awning can be retracted when you do not need the extra shade.
pros: A good value for the price
Will require more than one person to install
cons: Some customers have found slight modifications to help this awning perform at its best

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 units. Delivered on time and intact. Surprised that it was already assembled and just needed to be mounted. Key to mounting - find your first stud !! Then 16 inches on center to the next stud, etc. Once the minting brackets were up it was only 10 minutes to finish. We have a 20' deck and wanted the option to split up the sun hitting the deck, so we can choose to deploy 1 or 2 awnings. Very pleased with final product. Would purchase again and have already recommended to friends
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Do not resist strong winds, so just close rhem when it gets too windy Gives a great shade n look nice. Need two ppl. in order to instale. Come assembled n easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Norma V.

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Do not buy this product unless you live in a concrete house!
customer_reviews.text: The awning only comes with two bracket that are designed for mounting to a concrete wall only! You should not mount this to any home that is standard wood frame design. The load on the bracket footprint and beams will be extreme even with no wind loads considered. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: CGM

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice Products DO NOT Provide spare/replacement or missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Best Choice Products does NOT provide customers with any service and as they also mention somewhere on their website they do NOT carry or sell Replacement parts for most of their product.
customer_reviews.author: Poo

customer_reviews.title: Love it, came fast
customer_reviews.text: Love it, came fast! Ended up buying quarter inch bolts to mount to wood instead of what was in the box... Totally stoked! Will buy again for another area that needs shade and rain protection. Hoping for longevity for Hawaii weather ... Mahalos ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Adazzle

customer_reviews.title: First time installing and had little trouble!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to install! Awning cones fully assembled! All that’s needed is to installl brackets and adjust the arms to your liking while fully extended and that’s about it!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny &.

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of shit.
customer_reviews.text: It was lovely for about a month and then, as I went to roll it up one day, it just snapped apart!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Terrific choice...
customer_reviews.text: Awning mounted above my patio door which gets the afternoon to evening sun. Relieves the heat that can build up through the glass doors. I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gem's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for noon time Shade
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this up by his self last weekend. He is very much a handy man. Great at blocking noon time sun. 2 chairs and a side table fit perfectly under it. I almost can't wait until it rains so we can sit under it. I takes 2 hands to wind-out and retract the shade. I am guestimating that it takes about 30 seconds each way. It would take longer for an elderly person to do so. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sfoley

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome canopy, I highly recommend it. It came already assembled, all I had to do was install the wall brackets and lift it into place and install the two retaining bolts and presto I now have a nice canopy. For those who may not be mechanically inclined, Do not use the provided anchor bolts if installing to wood studs, you will need to purchase 4 - 31/2 inch lag bolts and make sure you find the wall studs. I like it so much I plan on buying another for my front deck.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Get what you pay for. Customer service is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Size was wrong, flimsy had up for about 3 hours and knew it was not going to be what we needed I contacted seller about returning it they wanted $99 for shipping and give me 15% credit. Screw that. We had complete box and papers and zero damage to the package even offered to ship at our cost (half of what they wanted) nope no deal. I sold it on FB marketplace for $125.00. Unless you have someplace that is not wide open to the wind and weather don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana K.Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, and more yes.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to tell you. I was going to put up a cheap $30 sunshade and stumbled upon this. Thought what the hell. Oh my God. Cheap, easy to install. Did by myself. And sturdy as can be. I would have liked to have different color options and I added some warning tape to prevent from our renters overextending it. Although, I have overextended it and it does not have any real adverse effects. Just being cautious I guess. My grandmother has a very expensive SunSetter and while those are definitely Superior for the price point, I don't know how you wouldn't consider this. Just buy it and you will see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this awning. It covers part of my deck on the lake perfectly. I’m not sure why there are complaints about installing. I mounted it to 4x4 posts with 3/8” lag screws. Works perfectly. I included pics of the instructions too. After mounting the brackets only two bolts are required to hold it to the bracket. Adjust the angle of each side to change the slope to your desired angle. Don’t expect this to withstand 100 mph winds, but shade on the deck while kids play in the lake it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Angie P.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Product was not easy to install. Husband had to run to Home Depot to get stuff to install properly. Keeps popping off every time we try to retract it. Looks nice when it is open and provides shade but I would NOT purchase this again if I had known it would be more trouble than it’s worth. I can tell we would have it up long cause it is a hassle to open and retract.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware:  2/3 cost ($99) to return if it doesn’t meet your needs
customer_reviews.text: This is for concrete wall. If you want it to secure it over vynl you must buy additional anchor bolts/screws. If you try to return through Amazon they charge you $99 to ship back. Does not appear well made. Going to try and install with suggested parts from another persons review. Can’t believe they want 2/3 of the cost of product to return. Obvious ploy for you to keep or resell to someone else. Amazon should ban this product and company from selling
customer_reviews.author: Randall R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about longevity as we just installed today however it seem of good quality for the price. If you have read other reviews you will note that it comes with bolts for concrete and not for wood siding so we install with purchased lag bolts. The canvas type top seems to be in good condition and adequately sewn. We did not find the installation too difficult however a parts list for additional parts would also have aided when and if you wanted to purchase replacement parts. There was only a illustration of how to install. We would like an additional bracket just for additional support.
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: and I love it. I give it 4 stars instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for a month now, and I love it. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 bc I had to spend extra $$$ to buy needed tools like the hammer drill to punch thr the stucco wall, and additional anchors. The current width fit exactly my 96" sliding door to the patio. I wish it is wider to at least 9 ft wide. Installation is easy, 30 min. But preparation, buy tools, find the studs, measurement took me a day.
customer_reviews.author: Phan

customer_reviews.title: Fell on my head!
customer_reviews.text: Had installed for 1 day. The part that rolls up the awning had its two end peices improperly built and upon rolling it up the first time, it shot apart from the spring pressure, and the rod landi ng on me!!! Picked it up and rolled it up to set like it is in the picture to get it out of the way. Backyard is now offlimits till this is fixed! Contacting them asap!
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewing Lane

customer_reviews.title: Check Everything
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great awning for the price, but make sure any and all brackets, screws, etc. are in their proper place and tightened, particularly the ones that hold the inner metal tube in place. My one side was out a little and loose, so I tapped it in tight and tightened the screws/bolts holding the bracket in place. That is the reason for four stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: Will G

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pierce of junk waiting to exspload.JUNK!!
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday my wife went to close it and it snapped apart at both ends . It missed her Head by inches.The Problem is the end pieaces are not secured. It’s a pierce of junk save your money.I want a full refund your product is assemblied cheaply no inspection or quality control it’s a pieace of crap👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Angellella

customer_reviews.title: installed under 1 hour ,1 person
customer_reviews.text: directions are fine if you have 1/2 brain. Measure about 3'' from the ends,this will be where the wall mount brackets go. Rolls and unrolls smoothly,if you unroll it too much the fabric will sag. All aluminum and fabric is thick,probably water proof. Was unrolled and 40 mph wind and rain storm for an hour---no problem ! would buy again
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Ok - you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to measure out your area - the product picture is very deceiving, as it is not that large. Mine came with a tear in the awning, but I didn't notice it until I had it installed already.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Attached to a siding covered exterior wall so had to spend some time and money making the 2x4 pretty, but worth it in the end and still very good price overall. It has withstood a couple storms already (closed). Only been installed a month or so, so didn't give 5 stars yet as I don't know it's lifespan yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kchristine

customer_reviews.title: For the $$$, great canopy.
customer_reviews.text: I think for the price you pay, this thing is great. It's actually pretty heavy duty aluminium. I had it up last summer and it did fine. I was expecting it to fall apart in a month but it held up just fine. I feel like at these prices you are gambling a bit but this was a good gamble.
customer_reviews.author: I. Main

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this awning!!! Its perfect for my patio! It would have been easy to install but the eves on my house were too narrow, so we had to add a board to mount it too. Definitely change out the screws/bolts that comes with it if you mount to wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and trouble
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturers quickly replaced item that was lost in shipment. Awning has even survived an unexpected wind gust with no damage, compared to a friend’s that cost ten times as much that received major damage
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best to locate brackets towards center of width of product ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made quality product. Installation instructions not extremely clear. Best to locate brackets towards center of width of product so as not to interfere with crank mechanism on left when facing the unit or the right side of the unit where the awning mechanism is bolted to the frame. Install best with two but can be done alone with balance. Used lag bolts secured into french balcony door header instead of masonry bolts included with unit.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Two person installation. Roll it in if it's too windy. Great for the price and looks good too.
customer_reviews.text: We used this a a morning sun shade for our side sliding doors. The value of this is great. The installation took 30-40 minutes with my son who knows how to do these things and a little help from a second person as balance and holding. I wish it came a bit longer maybe 104 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Meza

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Easy mount, easy operation. Original was damaged and replaced right away. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No one will touch this install, so I have 2 useless, insellable, unreturnable awnings in my garage. All of the install tips are ‘neat’ but even a contractor won’t take the insurance risk. Unless you are a team and don’t mind insurance risks, do NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold under a windy conddition
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice awning, but if it's windy or it rains it will not hold. I wish they would make a better product or at least make a support bracket so it can hold under a raining condition.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a great price
customer_reviews.text: The best customer services ever. Quality Product and easy to install. I received a defective product but quickly CS address the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Hot tub cover for rainy days. I keep cover in unless I need to use it. I prop it with pool noodles for drainage. Instructions say not for rain but that's what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: fishinmurph

customer_reviews.title: First class awning at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made awning. Easy to install and very attractive. Easily adjustable to various slopes. I mounted using lag bolts to the main timber on the front of my deck. The winding mechanism is smooth and the fabric excellent. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: MartinLA

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Well designed. Easy to operate. Looks great. Easy to adjust. Blocks sun and rain. Dislikes: Hardware was inadequate for brick walls, Instructions were poor, Took about 6+ hours to install. Overall: I would recommend this product based on price but be prepared to spend about $30 extra on better hardware and drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: R. Todd Gober

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The enclosed hardware are for use in cement only and not applicable for North American wood frame houses. You need to buy your own.
customer_reviews.author: albatros

customer_reviews.title: Nine feet canopy mechanical wind in and out
customer_reviews.text: Overall good value for money compared to a sun setter which I own a larger motorised version. The steel frame is solid. The only observation is that the canopy is lightweight and likely to need replacement in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: william hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We had some issues installing it but it can be done! The product has good quality and awesome value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ibisita

customer_reviews.title: Great buy..durable and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and durable. I like that you can roll it in when not in use. It provides shade in front of the door as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abrown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works great
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. Easy to install and hang. The color wasn’t tan it has a tinge of pink to them other than that it works great
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Came assembled
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled took me 10 minutes to install and adjust, into wood by myself, works great ,rained last night my dog and I stayed dry
customer_reviews.author: ras

customer_reviews.title: Very nice awning
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this awning for my son. Was very easy to install and looked terrific. He is really happy with it. Great price also!
customer_reviews.author: KNorris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We found it very essy to install but does require two people to insert pins in place due to length of the shade. We've had the shade up for about 4 months and love it. It provides shade over the window and is very easy to open and close. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: reinforce it on a timber frame house!
customer_reviews.text: read the reviews that said if putting on a lumber house, reinforce it which i did with 5 inch long stainless steel bolts , washers and nuts thru the 2x4s which cost $35 more , but very happy with the product itself!! its pretty much put together just a pain to mount it sturdy enough!! just wish now i had bought a larger one. but very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: KATHY MOWEN

customer_reviews.title: Great look great Price
customer_reviews.text: Wish material on awing hung down on right and left sides to block sun coming in . But beautiful and easy to install !
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. Easy to install. It comes with concrete anchors so you may need to get screws suitable for your home material... unless yours is concrete... I’m very happy with it. I wish there were other colors available.
customer_reviews.author: MCK

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised to receive our order so quickly, the instructions were very accurate, it is very good looking, and blocks the sun during the heat of the day to keep our house cooler. Totally thumbs up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: karen cates

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product great price. Assembly was easy. We put it on side of screenhouse to put kiddie pool and picnic table under it. Works great for us!
customer_reviews.author: krista walkley

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sturdy and it’s easy to install Definitely like it
customer_reviews.author: nathanael martinez

customer_reviews.title: Goid value, well built
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are worthless, its actually a very easy install. The internet will give you simple install instruction, that said, it is well built and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jay E. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work for what I wanted it to do so I had to use it in a different setting
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work for what I wanted it to do so I had to use it in a different setting
customer_reviews.author: Dwane E lind

customer_reviews.title: If doesn’t work you will pay big to return.
customer_reviews.text: Could not use because gutters in the way. Can’t rerun because they charge $99 to ship back.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Morton

customer_reviews.title: Nice product when installed
customer_reviews.text: Poor assembly instruction. You have to figure out where the clamps go. System material is metric
customer_reviews.author: W.Jager

customer_reviews.title: Retractable awning
customer_reviews.text: very well made easy to install good value for the money would definitely buy product again works smooth.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey c.

customer_reviews.title: Could not use it
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was my own dumb fault for not checking out the overhang on my roof, could not make it work without bending all the way over to walk out on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you mount the brackets the right way (bolt only goes in one way). Dry fit it on the ground. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: BEACH FROG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Super fantastic for price. Make sure to roll up if windy.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Easy install into the header. Heavyweight frame, adjusts easily, impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are happy we made this purchase. These shades are easy to install and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Purdy

customer_reviews.title: No issues, fast install.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, assembled just fine. I was able to install no problems. Thank you. Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: ScramPack

customer_reviews.title: Hello Shade
customer_reviews.text: It seems very durable, like the sticking and loop rings made real easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: ZURESH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected. Looks great, easy enough to install and easy to use. Provides just the right amount of shade in our back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Iva Nicolo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The instructions to assemble this are terrible. The pictures helped out.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Provides good protection from the sun. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MikeAB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real nice but unable to get the extended arms to lock in place
customer_reviews.author: Paul Armour

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great quality.will purchased another one for our other patio door. O and installed it within 20 min.
customer_reviews.author: Pretterrag

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: A great product . good quality and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: joanne craighead

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected and should last a long time. I would have rather had sun shade material but I knew what I was getting and it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Better and clearer install instructions such as size of drill bit to use with supplied hardware
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Gaita

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This product is solid. I love it. We have had it for 2 years and it's great
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: Take so long the shipment its always say its comimg that date & time nothing happen
customer_reviews.author: Jokno

customer_reviews.title: Great product ,awning
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, easy to install, works great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mckirahan

customer_reviews.title: nice sun shade
customer_reviews.text: it's very helpful to extend our roof, so i can enjoy our picnic withour sun,
customer_reviews.author: Helen Z

customer_reviews.title: Great item - installs in MINUTES
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. It was delayed a day during shipping which ticked me off. Took 4 business days. Install was a breeze. Took maybe 15 minutes to install and 5 minutes to adjust. Note: the install instructions say to install the bracket to concrete with the supplied anchor bolts but I installed with four 1/2"X3" lag bolts to my studs as my house has vinyl siding and no concrete. Ymmv but it seems pretty solid when installed to my studs. Really hoping to see increased shade as my doorwall faces the west and gets baked in sun in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: William J Oaten

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So far good! The only thing is that I will say that is kind of flimsy we haven’t got a really good wind.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The solar top of the umbrella was cracked upon receipt. This is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: David Tignor

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for a small area, I would recommend going bigger, and or ordering two
customer_reviews.text: I love it, a bit small, outside of that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid awning. Very good for the price. Instructions are not very good
customer_reviews.author: Denny F.

customer_reviews.title: This awning was perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This awning was perfect for my needs. It was preassembled. Should have bought two. Was up hanging in no time.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great awning
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic awning at a fantastic price. Good quality and durability so far. My neighbor has a similar one and he paid $800 more than what I paid...
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dents in frame and the material is crap. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: michael w. atkerson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to install. So surprised of quality of unit for the price. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good product for your money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, good quality product No issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Rafael De La Fuente

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great short term solution before we re-do our back porch with a roof. Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.author: Britney Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this product. The quality was excellent and price was good. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Galford

customer_reviews.title: Not the best wish they were better
customer_reviews.text: Not the best wish they were better . Wish I could send back after putting them up wish we dident
customer_reviews.author: Debnails307

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We put this up last fall. We did get the help of our fix it man because we're seniors and it was too heavy for us to do alone. It's great! A little smaller than I realized, but works.
customer_reviews.author: G.T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked well easy to install but was short in length
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for your money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for your money. Not a SunSetter. Came already assembled and need just screw brackets. Negative - came only with Sleeve Anchors and I have to buy Wood Screw
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and easy to install single handed if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and easy to install single handed if you are halfway competant. Mechanism is smooth and I like that one can easily adjust the tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Clough

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awning was easy to install, looks attractive and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Strobl

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the price. I had to return it as the measurements posted are not exact. The measurement width is the hardware, the actual fabric awning is shorter by several inches and it wouldn't fit in the space.
customer_reviews.author: valli Horwitz

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is great... Price is great... But installation was horrible! My husband and had a difficult time and came with horrible instructions! Took us a few hours and ended up having to get different anchors to make sure it stayed into our concrete wall.. Very frustrating but for the price is it a decent awning.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany E.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke within two weeks of having it up the metal was thin and cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap an' good.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy to use and then store. A cheap source of shade on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Ol blue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price, awesome product. Ordered 3 and had them installed
customer_reviews.author: Tim v.

customer_reviews.title: good well made product need to change out the mounting ...
customer_reviews.text: good well made product need to change out the mounting bolts for lag bolts but works great looks great
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our camp
customer_reviews.text: Nice canopy for the money. Good quality and a nice warranty. Now we can sit on the porch when the sun is so hot
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great buy so far...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far, once installed it's going to look awesome... Awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: SSG PAGAN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price! Live in Florida and it helps cut down sun light on my 2 windows. Cheaper than building a porch and very attractive. Will buy a few more to cover windows and doors . Tx!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss apple

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 98x80-inch Retractable Aluminum Polyester Patio Sun Shade Awning Cover w/UV- & Water-Resistant Fabric and Crank Handle - Beige
feature_bullets: UV- AND WATER-RESISTANT: This elegant outdoor patio awning is made of strong, UV- and water-resistant polyester and a rust-resistant, powder-coated aluminum frame
AMPLE SHADE FOR OUTDOOR SPACES: Ideal for use in a courtyard, patio, over windows, and on balconies, providing protection from UV rays
EASY CRANK HANDLE: Retractable design uses a built-in reel and crank handle to easily extend and retract the cover
HARDWARE INCLUDED: Install it on the side of the house against a concrete wall or solid surface
